title: F1 Commission discussing engine catch-up rules tweak
summary: F1 moves closer to changing its rules in a bid to avoid one engine manufacturer dominating for years, and looks to spark out the grass fires that plagued Suzuka

qa_pairs.question: What is the primary goal of the proposed changes to engine rules in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: To prevent one engine manufacturer from dominating for years.
wrong_options: To increase the number of engine manufacturers in F1.
To reduce the overall horsepower of the engines.
To extend the lifespan of the engines.

qa_pairs.question: What was one of the issues faced during the Suzuka race that the F1 Commission is addressing?
Which governing body is responsible for discussing and implementing rule changes in Formula 1?
